title: Bug: convoy stranded ignores bead dependencies
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Problem
`gt convoy stranded` lists beads as ready even when they have unmet dependencies.

## Reproduction
1. Create beads with dependencies: kr-8d9 depends on kr-x3k
2. Run `gt convoy stranded`
3. kr-8d9 shows as ready even though kr-x3k is not closed

## Expected
Only beads with ALL dependencies closed should appear as ready in stranded output.

## Impact
Auto-dispatch would sling blocked work, wasting resources or causing failures.

title: Feature: Convoy completion notifications
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

## Summary
When a convoy completes, notify relevant parties.

## Current State
- Convoys auto-close when all tracked issues complete
- Help text mentions 'notifies subscribers' but no subscription mechanism visible
- No way for Mayor or human to get async notification

## Desired Behavior
1. Convoy has a `subscribers` field (list of addresses: mayor/, human email, etc.)
2. On convoy close, Deacon sends mail to all subscribers
3. Mayor can check mail on next session start to see completed convoys

## Use Case
Human kicks off convoy, walks away. Later, checks in with Mayor who reports:
'Convoy hq-cv-xxx completed while you were away. All 5 beads landed.'

## Configuration
- `gt convoy create ... --subscribe mayor/`
- `gt convoy subscribe <convoy-id> <address>`

title: Feature: Deacon auto-feeds stranded convoys
description:
## Summary
Deacon should automatically dispatch work for stranded convoys without manual intervention.

## Current State
- `gt convoy stranded` detects convoys with ready work and no workers
- Manual step required: `gt sling mol-convoy-feed deacon/dogs --var convoy=<id>`
- No auto-dispatch happens

## Desired Behavior
Deacon patrol should:
1. Run `gt convoy stranded` periodically
2. For each stranded convoy, auto-sling ready beads
3. Respect `max_parallel` limit if configured
4. Continue until convoy completes

## Configuration Options
- `auto_dispatch: true/false` on convoy (opt-in)
- `max_parallel: N` to limit concurrent polecats per convoy

## Depends On
- gt-5w1 (convoy stranded must respect dependencies first)
